148.heading: Dental Floss.
148.title: "Mac the Dentist"
148.author: by Kevin McCormick.
notes: Summary: Speaking of white-collar crime, cousin Mac used to wear other people's denture impressions, got on "60 Minutes" for attempting to import foreign dental floss and was arrested for performing unauthorized root canals.

150.heading: Dental Floss.

notes: Summary: If you use enough dental floss you can do your whole mouth at once.

151.heading: Dental Floss.
151.title: "Pining Away for Kudzu Dubose"
151.author: Marlette.
notes: Summary: Ida Mae Wombat reads her essay about her Summer vacation, which included computer camp, selling dental floss door-to-door, rushing the stage when Leonard Nimoy appeared at an sf convention in Atlanta, and writing Kudzu's name in magic markers all over her loose-leaf notebook.
